wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Relax and drink coffee with perfect view. You deserve it!
The best accessories gifts is in our store! Take a look!
Time for movies! Take your snack and relax!

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: ioanna
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to A+ Mall, the new amazing place for shopping in town. Here you can find more than 120 stores including fashion stores for men, women and kids, tech stores, a food court, cafe & bars, cinema, playground for out little friends and many more! The A+ Mall is located a few miles away fromthe center of thecity and is easily reachable with a car, bus or taxi. With modern architectural design and standard ancillary services, the A+ Mall ensures a comfortable and pleasant navigation for visitors depend on their tastes and needs! Use our information desks and the maps you can find on a lot of places on every level of the mall to find the stores you are looking for.
100 Fashion Stores 8 Tech Stores 20 Restaurants 10 Cafe & Bars 8 Banks & ATMs 1 Cinema 3 Supermarkets 2 Pharmacies 4 Levels 1500 parking seats

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Modern T-Shirts and Trousers are waiting for you! Come and get them!
The best baby clothes for your boy or girl!
Are you hungry after shopping? Take a pizza!
Let your kids play in our renovated place!
Relax and drink wine with soft music and good service!
